item.description:
Novogodnii kontsert "Udivitel'naya koshka" - pesni na stichi Harmsa, Chernogo, Usatseva i dr. Konkurs na lutchii novogodnii kostum, stichi, podarki ot Deda Moroza i Snegurochki.

When: January 9, Sunday, 12 pm
Location: Lukomor'e, 50 Kearney Street, Needham,

Please reserve tickerts by December 25. Adult $15, Child (with the present)-$20, without present - $15.

Please send checks to Tatyana Zadorskaya
23 Sawin Street
Marlborough, MA 01752

Info: 617-785-0217 or concerts21@yahoo.com

group.name: Families with Russian Kids, Moms Club, Playgroups

item.name: Novogodnii kontsert - bard-duet Tatiana Zadorskaya and Ekaterina Nechaeva
